title: To establish an Emergency Malpractice Liability Insurance Commission.
content: Emergency Malpractice Liability Insurance Commission (EMLIC) Act - Establishes the Emergency Malpractice Liability Insurance Commission to examine the causes of soaring medical malpractice premiums and propose a comprehensive strategy to alleviate the impact. Directs the Commission to investigate and determine whether a causal relationship exists between: (1) skyrocketing malpractice insurance premiums, (2) jury awards, (3) decreased accessibility and affordability of health care. And (4) an increase in the number of physicians moving, quitting, or retiring.
